reviewText: Received this promptly as ordered.  While the costumes may tend to seem a bit whack, this is a must own for any Alejandra Guzman.  I'm all about costume changes so I did not mind it as much as a prior reviewer did.  The DVD does not contain any special features and it is a bit too short.  There could have been other hits included.  Can't wait to re-watch this on big ass tv screen with volume turned up!
Loved it. I just wished it was longer and with extra material, as the Mexican edition. Alejandra Guzman Rocks! Fast and excellent service from Amazon.com  Thank you
I have to returned the first DVD I recevied because it has a scratch, but they sent me back one new in a couple of days, very fast. Very good service

I have been a fan of her since I was a little girl and watched her for the first time at a palenque and have been to most of her shows in Mexico city and Queretaro. I even went to Club Rio to see her so if your a fan of her this is the dvd for you I had another one it was one of her first the picture and quality wasn't the best BUT for this was it's clear and very nice and she puts a heck of a show and it even has Jenni Rivera La diva de la banda ( may she rest in peace) so a must must have for any La Guzman !

I have never seen an Alejandra show, live or on TV, so I was very excited to get this dvd and watch it right away. She is still Ale, great stage presence, great voice and great songs. Too bad it is only a few of her loooong list of hits. But what is up with the customs? I know she is playing with moderatto but I thin that the outfits do not fit them anymore and it took a star from her performance since it was a little distracting. It is still worth buying for the music and the super star, just be warned, the outfits are silly!

Alejandra, nunca he tenido el placer de verla en vivo, ni en persona, ni el video. Este video esta muy bueno, es algo corto pero muy bueno, ella tan bella como siempre, cantando muy bien, y hechando desmadre como siempre. Pero lo unico que se me hace algo ridiculo con este video es el vestuario. Ya se que canta con moderatto y ellos tambien son locos...pero la verdad todos, Ale tambien, todos se ven ridiculos. Ya estan muy viejos/gordos para andar con sus tonterias. Ser rocanroleros es una cosa, payasos es otra. Creo que son muy buenos musicos como para que distraigan a la gente con su vestuario ridiculo. Al final de todo...me encanto este dvd y se lo recomiendo a cualquier persona que le guste la Ale!

La Guzman is here to stay and this DVD concert which celebrates her 20 plus years in the music business proves it! Yes she's had her weak albums but she's also had her strong ones and a true complete artist has its imperfections.

Forget that other DVD concert that was released some years ago....this one has the more professional touch. I'll admit it sort of loses momentum halfway thru but it's still worthwhile to stick with it till the end.

Alejandra Guzmn en vivo en el palacio de los deportes en Mxico con Moderatto haciendole compaa:
a) La Alex sabe rockear, una de las pocas voces latinoamericanas que impone su propio estilo. Ella tiene mucho que gritar, mucho que llorar, canta con tal sentimiento que su voz penetra en el alma de los que la escuchamos.
b) Una mujer que se ha mantenido en el transcurso de los aos con esa esencia pura y amante al buen rock.
c) La lista de canciones: 1. Verano Peligroso feat. Moderatto, 2. Mralo Mralo feat. Moderatto, 3. No Te Lo Tomes Personal feat. Moderatto, 4. Llama Por Favor feat. Moderatto, 5. Volverte A Amar feat. Moderatto, 6. Hacer El Amor Con Otro feat. Moderatto, 7. Ya Lo Vea Venir feat. Moderatto, 8. Hey Gera feat. Moderatto, 9. Mala Hierba feat. Moderatto and Vico C, 10. De Verdad feat. Moderatto, 11. Da De Suerte feat. Moderatto, 12. Eternamente Bella feat. Moderatto and Jenni Rivera, 13. Un Grito En La Noche feat. Moderatto.
d) Moderatto pone su estilo pintoresco, pero no por eso deja de ser una buena banda, acompaa a la Alex tocando de manera memorable, sin duda una buena dupla.
